paragraphs.body: Are fanon pages about LEGO Avatar video games allowed? Cause I've got fanon-information about 6 LEGO Avatar videogames right now. (three for each season of Avatar, one for the first three post-war comic trilogies, and 2 for LoK {one for every two seasons}). --SorcererSupreme21 (wall • contribs) 19:03, February 17, 2014 (UTC)
